author: Staff Reporter
text:
The Madras High Court on Tuesday granted conditional anticipatory bail to seven officials of a private financial institution who apprehended arrest in an abetment of suicide case, in connection with the death of a farmer in Ariyalur district on March 10.

Justice K. Kalyanasundram granted the relief on the applications moved by R. Balamurugan and six others, all employees of the Cholamandalam Investment and Finance Company Limited. Alagar, a resident of Orathur Village, Ariyalur took a loan of Rs.7 lakh from the company to buy a tractor. He paid back Rs 5.1 lakh , but defaulted in paying back the balance. On March 10, seven persons claiming to be the officials from the company visited Alagar's house and abused him for not settling the balance, and seized the tractor. Soon after the incident, the farmer committed suicide.
title: Bank officials get advance bail in farmer suicide case
